name: Trade Regulations Ace
title: Top-notch Trade Regulations
description: In 2024, Portugal scored an impressive 88.92 in the quality of regulations for international trade, showcasing its robust framework for global commerce.

name: Labor Law Champions
title: Exemplary Labor Regulations
description: Portugal's labor regulations were rated at 88.23 in 2024, reflecting a strong commitment to fair and effective labor practices.

name: Education Persistence Pioneers
title: Unwavering Female Education
description: In 2020, Portugal achieved a 100% persistence rate for females reaching grade 5 and the last grade of primary education, highlighting its dedication to female education.
